activities_info.details:
We are a grassroots team of Philadelphia-based health professional students mobilizing to provide healthcare workers with the Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) they need to combat the COVID-19 Pandemic. We work alongside the Department of Public Health to ensure all donations are distributed fairly.

We represent students from medical, dental, and health professions schools across the greater Philadelphia area, including Drexel Med, Temple Med, Jefferson Med, PCOM, Penn Nursing, Penn Med, Drexel PA, Temple Podiatry, Penn Vet Med, Cooper Med, Geisinger Med, Penn Dental, etc.).

directusSchool.name: Philadelphia Organization of Health Professions Students
